e99d460d;[#129]: introduce IANA port numbers for AMQP 1.0 for both secure and insecure connections. Insecure port must be explicitly allowed (not allowed by default). Both ports can coexist, both port numbers can (but do not need to) be configured. Illegal combinations are checked and Hono refuses to start with explicit error message.
